text: atinal ni ksamikkuka. ichasaktiyulla daivadutanmar ksamiccapeale. i satyanisedhikalute karyattil ni tirakku kuttatirikkuka. avarkk vagdanam nalkappetunna siksa neril kanunna divasam avarkku teannum: tannal pakalilninnearu vinalika neramallate bhuleakatt vasiccittillenn. it orariyippan. iniyum adharmikalallate arenkilum nasattinnarharakumea
